'''NOTES''':
* Forum ambassadors, please edit to add ideas you're working and/or helping on. If you want to handle an idea already listed by another ambassador, just add your name to the "Handled by" cell.

* Aliases can be, but are not necessarily potential spec titles; they should be regarded just as working titles. Many of the ideas will probably be combined into composite specs.

* Not all the ideas may require specs to be written; some require the filing of (sometimes multiple) bug reports and developer consultation only, some require bounties, etc.

* With ideas that concern upstream, upstream developers have to be consulted, and/or bugs filed. These do not concern Ubuntu development, but are preserved as items the FA team may deal with due to high demand from the community.

* the relevant launchpadspecs for these ideas are : https://blueprints.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+spec/ubiquity-forumideas and https://blueprints.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+spec/gutsy-forumideas

* We also registered a discussion spec on launchpad : https://blueprints.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+spec/ubuntuforums-ambassadors-discussion
